meanings.sent1: She showed her faintheartedness by avoiding the haunted house.
meanings.sent2: The faintheartedness of the puppy was evident as it cowered in the corner.
meanings.sent3: His faintheartedness in the face of a tiny spider always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The soldier's faintheartedness in battle was like a flickering candle in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The faintheartedness of the young explorer contrasted with the bravery of her older companion.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being faint-hearted.
meanings.sent1: The faintheartedness of the team led to their defeat in the championship.
meanings.sent2: His faintheartedness was evident in the way he hesitated before every decision.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the faintheartedness of his audience, saying they were scared of their own shadows.
meanings.sent4: The faintheartedness of the city council in making tough decisions left the citizens frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The faintheartedness of the kitten was endearing to all who met her.
